response.original_title: In Search of Boozers and Schmucks
response.overview: In Search of Boozers and Schmucks" is a short documentary set in the high turnover, high stakes, escalatingly costly world of sports card collecting, where hundreds of millions of dollars are spent every year in search of Holy Grail cards. But, Joshua Morris moves to the beat of a different drum guided by one key metric: is the card funny? Comical names and hilarious looking cards with amusing backstories are his specialty. Forget Lebron James and Tom Brady rookies - Joshua is looking for an autographed card of the late NASCAR sensation Dick Trickle.
response.title: In Search of Boozers and Schmucks
